feedback.title: Contact to psychologist
feedback.step1: If you are in despair, hopelessness, in a difficult situation, have lost faith, meanings, support.
feedback.step2: If you lost a loved one or a dear person, or a friend
feedback.step3: If you need support or help
feedback.step4: If you simply have something to say - write.

book.title: How are you?
book.subtitle: Books for psychological support to each other
book.description: <1>Books for military and civilians, that help to learn how to give psychological support to each other during the war.</1><2> Because of the war, there are a lot of people with the trauma experience and there are not enough psychologists. Thatâ€™s why each of us can be a psychologist a little bit for those who need support or help.</2>
